summary: Provides the AutotoolsDeps helper that extracts C++ package information from Conan, builds appropriate linker and rpath flags, assembles environment variables, creates dependency files, and determines the correct order of dependent components for Autotools-based builds.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of Conan-managed C++ libraries into projects that use the Autotools build system by automating dependency resolution, flag generation, and environment configuration.
